name: Bomb Runner (Platformer)
description:
This is a very work in progress game, but I feel like I've put more effort into this game than the other bomb runner.

I accidently used my two free exports before adding the icons, so I'll reupload later.

Controls are WASD/Arrow Keys to move K,Shift and Spacebar to jump

To do:

  • Add enemies
  • Music that loops better
  • Falling Cord Zone
  • Hell Land Zone
